snippet.title: New Touhou Indie Game Demo Available Now「Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy」
snippet.description:
Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy is a "Touhou Project" 2D Fan game made of "Horizontal Action"+"Danmaku Bullet hell". In this BOSS RUSH game you play as the beloved Cirno, and embark on her journey to liberate the Gansokyo and save her dear one.

- Play the demo & Wishlist the game on Steam to get notified when the full game release (2023) : 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1955830/

- Twitter :
https://twitter.com/TouhouGamePulse

- Patreon :
https://www.patreon.com/TouhouGamePulse
